definitions.definition: A soldier , normally a member of a marine corps , trained to serve on board or from a ship .
examples: He was a marine in World War II.
He fought with the Marines in World War II.

definitions.definition: A painting representing some marine subject.
Any fleet of ships (commercial, military, or both).

main_definition: ( military , nautical ) A soldier , normally a member of a marine corps , trained to serve on board or from a ship .
secondary_definitions: ( capitalised in the plural ) : A marine corps .
A painting representing some marine subject.
( archaic ) Any fleet of ships (commercial, military, or both).
